name: Government Simulator 2
description: Government Simulator 2 is based on real world statistics and data and lets you control a whole country, like the USA, Germany, UK, France, Russia, and others: Change laws, taxes and budgets, and see what happens. Manage emergencies, impose tariffs, start wars.

name: Mega Man: The New Lands
description: Mega Man: The New Lands is a complete ROM hack of Mega Man 1 (not Rockman 1). It features custom levels, custom robot masters, new musics, original art for every stage, modified weapons, enemies and bosses behaviors, faster megabuster shooting and increased shots limit, no knockback after getting damage, removes the deceleration of Megaman, making him stops instantly after the player stop pressing left or right, the most annoying enemies were nerfed, modified damage for each weapon, etc.

name: Bandit Realms
description: A medieval turn-based strategy card game with a procedurally generated world map to explore and conquer.

name: Water City
description: Slice, burn, torment, throw water, and smite those repulsive dark creatures

name: Thistlemine
description: Thistlemine is a puzzle RPG that tells a story about the work that takes place within an Anomalis Exclusion Zone – a hostile environment where space and time are warped, and the thick miasma suffocates those trapped within.

name: Ludde
description: Explore a charming winter world with Ludde and discover various exciting, challenging, and fun activities for all ages!

name: VanillaBeast: Retro Knock-Out!
description:
VB Retro Knock-Out! is the first prequel chapter to VanillaBeast: Ace in the Hole. Follow Vanilla as he works through the boxing ranks facing off against tons of parody boxing opponents on his way to the undisputed champion of the Venereousville Boxing Association.. Tike Myson.

Experience nostalgic game play and visuals as you battle over 30 parody opponents in your quest to become the champ. Retro Knock-Out! is a “pick up and play” arcade boxing game with beautiful pixel art, incredible arenas, mature story, and fast-paced arcade style game play.

name: Our Passing Thoughts
description: 【 It’s like catch but the ball is the ability to jump. 】 Take on the role as one of two creatures in this imaginative co-op experience that tests how well you and your friend get along. Explore a broken world together and discover what is valuable, and what remains just a passing thought.

name: Sneaky Rat
description: Push mirrors, hide behind boxes, don't be seen by the cat and get the cheese. In this fun puzzle.

name: Namco: Featuring Pac-Man
description: Features Pac-Man, Galaxian, Rally-X, Dig Dug, and Bosconian.

name: Namco: Featuring Ms. Pac-Man
description: Features Ms. Pac-Man, Galaga, Xevious, Mappy, and Pole Position. A later revision adds the ability to save high scores, which all future Jakks Pacific systems also featured. It was re-released in 2005 with a GameKey slot, which were compatible with "NM" GameKeys.

name: Super Pac-Man Collection
description: Features Super Pac-Man, Pac-Man, Pac-Man Plus, and Pac & Pal.

name: Flappy Cheep Cheep
description: A homebrew version of Flappy Bird on the Virtual Boy, replacing the bird with a Cheep Cheep from the Super Mario series.

name: Arcade Gold featuring Pac-Man
description: Features Pac-Man, Pac-Man Plus, Pac & Pal, Super Pac-Man, Galaxian, Bosconian, Dig Dug, and New Rally-X.

name: Retro Arcade: Pac-Man
description: Features Pac-Man, Super Pac-Man, Pac & Pal, Pac-Man Plus, Galaga, Galaxian, Dig Dug, Mappy, Bosconian, Xevious, Pole Position, and New Rally-X.

name: Wireless Ms. Pac-Man
description: Rerelease of Ms. Pac-Man with a wireless controller, and additional games New Rally-X and Bosconian.

name: Mega Man Wily's Conquest 2: Hyper Edition Turbo!
description:
This is a complete hack to a previously unfinished version by DragonEye Studios. The abandoned version had some great ideas and lots of potential, so the purpose of this project was to refine the problematic areas and complete the hack so that the player can play all the way to the end and finish the game.

List of features, additions and changes:

1) Increased the speed of Mega Man and the Mega Buster!
2) Wily-4 and other previously unfinished stages are now 100% complete!
3) Added new challenges to all of the stages!
4) Changed the entire soundtrack with great music by Blast Hornet, WINED, Tsukikuro, Hydrawisk, DARS, and 8-bit fan.
5) Changed various weapons mechanics and physics.
6) Changed boss AIs, HP, and boss room layouts for new challenges.
7) Changed damage amount from various weapons to different bosses.
8) Updated various sound effects and graphics.
9) Increased climbing speed.
10) Fixed and refined stages from enemy spams and poor layouts from the original version.
11) Lots of new additional changes to all of the stages.
12) Updated title screen, menu screens, texts, and ending credits.
13) Reduced amount of energy used for most weapons.
14) Various bug fixes.
15) And many more various additions and fixes.

name: Let's! TV Play Namco Nostalgia 1
description: Includes Mappy and Xevious, in addition to brand-new games Mappy: Revenge of Nyamco and Xevious: Scramble Mission.

name: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle - Limited Edition
description:
Arkanoid: Eternal Battle - Limited Edition includes:
- Game: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle
- 3D Lenticular
- 16-Page Instruction Booklet
- Exclusive Taito Classic In-Game Background
- Digital Original Soundtrack

name: Let's! TV Play Namco Nostalgia 2
description: Includes Gaplus and Dragon Buster, in addition to brand-new games Gaplus Phalanx and Dragon Buster 100.

name: Flappybird for MSX
description: A homebrew version of Flappy Bird, created for MSX computers.

name: Pac-Man Connect & Play
description: Features Pac-Man, Super Pac-Man, Pac & Pal, Pac-Man Plus, Galaga, Galaxian, Dig Dug, Mappy, Bosconian, Xevious, New Rally-X, and Pac-Man 256. Shaped like an 8-bit graphic of Pac-Man (or as a Blinky in the PAL version).

name: Ms. Pac-Man
description: Only features the 1993 NES version of Ms. Pac-Man. Later revisions flip the control panel backwards for unknown reasons.

name: Namco Classics Vol. 1
description: Slightly modified NES/Famicom versions of Pac-Mania, Dig Dug II, and The Tower of Druaga. Seemingly only released in Canada. A second volume was never released (or announced).

name: Bandai Namco Flashback Blast!
description: Features NES/Famicom versions of Pac-Man, Dig Dug, Galaga, Galaxian, Mappy, Sky Kid, and Xevious. Pac-Mania is included in Wal-Mart while The Tower of Druaga is included in other stores.

name: Bandai Namco Arcade Blast!
description: Features Pac-Man, Pac-Mania, Dig Dug, Galaga, Galaxian, New-Rally-X. Mappy, Sky Kid, The Tower of Druaga, and Xevious.

name: Pac-Man Collection
description: Features Pac-Man, Pac-Mania, New Rally-X, Galaga, Galaga '88, Dig Dug, Super Xevious, Rolling Thunder, Dragon Spirit, and Mappy. Additional ROMs for various formats (NES, Game Boy Advance, Atari 2600/7800, etc.) can be added via a Micro SD card.

name: Let's Sing 2023
description: Let's Sing returns to 2023 edition!

name: Pac-Man Giant Joystick
description: An extremely large joystick standing roughly two feet tall, with Pac-Man himself as the joystick's top. Gamelist is identical to Pac-Man Collection.

name: Gigantosaurus Dino Kart
description: Race around Cretacia in a prehistoric kart championship for up to 4 players of all ages, where you can play as your favorite dino friends and even bump into the mysterious Gigantosaurus himself!

name: New Joe & Mac: Caveman Ninja - T-Rex Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pac-Man 256
description:
Pac-Man 256 is an official hack of the original Pac-Man starting right before Level 256; not to be confused with the 2015 game.

It was only released in Pac-Man Connect and Play.

name: Galaxy Games StarPak 2
description: Galaxy Games StarPak 2 is an arcade game released in 1998 by Creative Electronics & Software. It is a multigame conversion kit for Galaxy Games-branded arcade machines, adding additional games. It features unique versions of Pac-Man and Ms. Pac-Man not found elsewhere, which feature two-player cooperative modes. The games are controlled using a trackball.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr and all additional content.

You are an Inquisitor, the Imperium's most powerful agent.
In this action-RPG, choose from amongst several character classes and take part in tactical and violent combat, in solo or co-op mode.

name: Red Bull Pac-Man
description:
Red Bull Pac-Man is a game released in 2018 to advertise Red Bull energy drinks. It is a modified version of Pac-Man which featured new mazes and power-ups.

The game was released as an arcade machine, which was distributed in gas stations and department stores. It was also available as a downloadable pack for the iOS and Android version of Pac-Man, accessed via a code which was on actual Red Bull cans.

name: Need for Speed: Unbound
description: Race against time, outsmart the cops, and take on weekly qualifiers to reach The Grand, Lakeshore's ultimate street racing challenge. Pack your garage with precision-tuned, custom rides and light up the streets with your style, exclusive fits, and a vibrant global soundtrack that bumps in every corner of the world.

name: Pretz Pac-Man
description: Pretz Pac-Man is an HTML game released in 2017 to promote the Japanese snack Pretz. It is based on the original arcade game, but Pac-Man eats Pretz in a maze with a giant capital letter in the center. A code from the Pretz box would be entered to unlock access to the game.

name: Smurfs Kart: Turbo Edition
description: That is the question you will need to answer in this dynamic kart racing game in the world of Smurfs! The whole family can choose one Smurf, its kart and special power, then you’re ready to go on wild races!

name: Eme-Man
description: Eme-Man is a Pac-Man game released in 2017 on the Japanese Coca-Cola app; it promotes the Georgia European line of coffee products. Gameplay is almost identical to the original Pac-Man, but the Ghosts are slower, Fruits are coffee products, Power Pellets are coffee beans, Pac-Dots are red, and the maze is a shade of cyan (identical to Pac-Man Plus's maze color).

name: PA-3 X Pac-Man Special Game
description: PA-3 X Pac-Man Special Game is an online game released in 2018 to promote PA-3, a yogurt released by Meiji Dairies. The game is just a recreation of the first level of Pac-Man with food surrounding the maze. In addition to the new maze graphics, there is a form of Stamina bar that decreases over time. The lower the stamina gets, the slower Pac-Man moves. However, eating a fruit (or PA-3 bottle) will restore the meter and Pac-Man's speed to full.

name: million x Pac-Man
description:
million x Pac-Man is a game released in 2019 to promote a line of men's perfume by Paco Rabanne.

Unlike the other titles, million x Pac-Man is considerably different than the original Pac-Man. The maze's dots continuously respawn, and it is impossible to eat them all. Pac-Man charges up a "Snap" meter, and upon eating 28 Pac-Dots, he is able to cause something strange to happen when launched.

name: Morinaga Pac-Man mini
description:
Morinaga Pac-Man mini is an online game first published in March of 2020. Released by Morinaga, it promotes their "Hi-Chew Mini" and "Caramel Mini" candies. While defunct, this game is still fully playable via the Internet Archive.

The Hi-Chew and Caramel Mini candies encouraged "flavor mixing" by eating two specific flavors at once, forming a "new" flavor when combined. The game is adapted from the arcade original, though the Power Pellets are replaced with the respective candies; the Ghosts will turn into the actual candy flavors formed by mixing.

There are both "Normal" and "Special" game modes. In a standard game, the maze would be randomly selected to be either a Hi-Chew or Caramel maze. In the special game, the two mazes appear side-by-side, both being played at once. The special game was accessed via the UPC code on an actual candy box; this can still be played today by entering a known code, 166 and 001.

name: Sabritas Pac-Man
description: Sabritas Pac-Man was released in collaboration with Sabritas; effectively the Mexican version of Frito-Lay. During this promotion, Pac-Man Tazos were included in specially-marked potato chip bags, alongside a giveaway promotion and a special online game.

name: LOL: Hasse toh Phasse x Pac-Man
description: LOL - Hasse toh Phasse x Pac-Man (sometimes shortened to just "LOL Pac-Man") was a game released in 2021, based on an Amazon Prime video series. It was a very poor quality version of Pac-Man, where the player controlled one of ten "Hasse toh Phasse" cast members' heads.

name: Web3War
description:
Web3War, the multiplayer shooter developed by Roll1ng Thund3rz and incubated by Zilliqa, delivers an exciting and competitive FPS experience that rivals the top shooting games on the market.
The game offers action-packed gameplay, tactical maps, custom load-outs, weapon skins, progression, and many more of the features found in many of the best FPS games.

Web3War also uses blockchain technology to allow players to earn valuable rewards from playing the game. Unlike most other Web3 games,

name: Elite Soldier Shooter
description: Sometimes there are tasks where SWAT can not handle... and then you appear — Elite Soldier. You are the "champion" on special assignments.

name: Drift Horizon: Racing, Driving & Parking Trial Simulator Games
description: Become a legendary drifter! Tune and upgrade your car, install parts and boost performance!

name: Krispain Hero
description: What can go through a former warrior’s head upon seeing an incomprehensible portal in the middle of the road? It is to go through the portal, of course, to explore an alternative past, where the world is definitely not ruled by people.

name: Car Racing: Highway Driving Simulator
description: Car Racing Highway Driving Simulator - start your engines and step on the gas!

name: World of Deadliest Catch
description:
In Deadliest Catch, you will have the opportunity to take part in dangerous sea races for prey and catch as many crabs as you could not imagine! Your task is not an easy one - you will have to struggle with time, catch quotas, migration of crabs, and, most importantly, with the sea itself. This is your destiny in the waters of Alaska!

Your ship will be in the same conditions as any ship sailing out of Dutch Harbor every autumn in the hope that the deep sea will bestow its treasures on it. He will be afloat in any weather - like a breeze, a strong wind and even a storm - you don't care. The restless sea, the soaking wet deck, the ship swaying on the waves - you can handle everything!

name: JDM Drag Racing
description:
JDM Tuner Racing is the game you have been waiting for to speed through the streets and let your potential flow.
Drag race and enjoy the opportunity to customize your air filter, exhaust, ECU, intake, head, pistons, turbo, gearbox, nitrous, tires and others.
The game lets you be in charge of the transmission so you can discover the underground in your own tuning. You chose the make, the color and all other details for your car so you can level up, earn money, and unlock more available features.

name: Real Car Driving
description: If you are looking for a realistic driving simulator where you can drive a variety of cars on big open world maps, this game is just for you!

name: Ninjala: Story Pack - Chapter Three
description: Story Mode is a single-player mode that can be experienced offline. Enjoy a tale of ninja intrigue told through dynamic graphic novel-style cut scenes and intense action-packed gameplay. In the action sequences, you'll battle sinister space ninja and per…

name: Classic Games Collection Vol.2
description:
This is a second installment of the series in which we present you with popular classic games from across the world! Prove your mastery in those titles by playing against the AI or a friend in a local co-op mode. This is a perfect game bundle to get your brain juices flowing!

Games included in the bundle:

- Mahjong - Traditional Asian game in which you will have to match sets and pairs of tiles.
- Word Search - find all the words hidden in the puzzle!
- Battleships - Choose a right strategy to guess the placement of the enemy ships on the map!
- Hangman - Can you guess the right word before the stick man hangs?

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii
description: Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the pre-made templates or create your own illustrations.

name: Beeny
description: A vertical 2D platformer featuring a round bee in an early 90s pre-rendered environment. Roll and hop up to the precious honey.

name: Frogy World
description: Frogy World is a 2D platformer game.

name: Kayko & Kokosh Coloring Book
description: Sin descripción

name: Maximum Velocity
description:
Maximum Velocity is a high-stakes, high-speed racing game looking to shake up the racing genre forever. Join your friends and take on challenges in an immersive, ever-changing world. Drift, drag, or sprint your way around Industrial City and discover hidden secrets to the lore and ever-evolving story.
Drive the way you want to.

Upgrade your vehicles to handle the way you want them to. Make them as fast as you want or as drifty as you wish. You are in control of your car and how it handles. Unlock performance parts by exploring the city and doing challenges to get rewards and upgrades.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Deluxe Edition
description:
Includes:
- Main Game
- 90-Day Taiko Music Pass (single-use non-auto-renew)

name: Cyber Protocol: Retro Arcade
description: Find your way around demanding challenges, traps and mechanics. They may be easy to grasp but they're very hard to master. Find a way to gather all of the coins and become the best hacker.

name: Eagle Simulator
description: Soar through the skies and live your life as a majestic eagle! Your mission is to be as fast, determined and wise as an eagle, but you have to be careful because any little mistake will cost you.

name: Nobody Saves the World + Frozen Hearth Bundle
description:
A bundle including the base game and the Frozen Hearth expansion.

Nobody Saves the World is an action role-playing game played from a top-down perspective. The game can be played solo or in a cooperative multiplayer mode. In the game, the player controls a blank-state character named Nobody, who is equipped with a wand.

name: Demolish Derby: Nitro-Battle
description: Are you looking for a game where you can have fun destroying your vehicle? Speed up and go crazy in the newest driving game with realistic physics!

name: Snug Finder: More Fun
description: The fun continues: new levels are coming! There are more hidden items, and you can start finding them now. Start solving 24 new unique levels of Snug Finder!

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Elyrion
description: Elyrion is Polytopia’s second Special Tribe! Emerging from isolation in a mystical forest, the Elyrion will stop at nothing to uncover the magical secrets of the Square. The Elyrion are known for surrounding themselves in the magic of the forests, using their powers to lure woodland denizens to their Sanctuaries for profit, bargain with awesome dragons, and enchant animals into soldiers to help them fight.

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Cymanti
description:
Have you ever felt that the cute denizens of the Polytopian world needed more bugs in their lives? Well, you’re in luck, because the Cymanti have come from the heart of the wetlands to infest the Square through the power of gigantic bugs and poisonous fungus!

The Cymanti are a breakout group of Polytopians who moved to the swampy forests long ago and learned to live in symbiosis with the incredible Ciru Bug, which attaches to their faces and merges with their brains! These bug-loving Polytopians cultivate fungus that they use to feed their population and defend themselves from invaders! Led by a mystical Shaman, the Cymanti train gigantic bugs, use their enemies to fertilize their fungi farms, and bathe their foes in crippling poisons to vanquish all who would threaten their marshy home!

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Polaris
description: Polaris is Polytopia’s third Special Tribe! From the frozen wastes emerge the Polaris, servants of the mysterious Gaami, who are hellbent on freezing the Square into a new frigid paradise. Imbued with icy powers granted by their overlords, the Polaris construct adorable Mooni, freeze the waters, shatter their foes, and diligently work their way toward an unforeseen fate...

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Deluxe
description: Includes 5 items: The Battle of Polytopia, Aquarion Tribe, Elyrion Tribe, Polaris Tribe, Cymanti Tribe. (All special tribes)

name: The Battle of Polytopia: All Special Tribes
description: The Battle of Polytopia - All Special Tribes includes the Aquarion, ∑∫ỹriȱŋ, Cymanti, and Polaris Tribe DLCs.

name: Memory: The Original Matching Game from Ravensburger
description:
Everyone knows it, everybody loves it: hardly any other game manages to bring young and old together more than this.
Pick up two cards: if they match, you keep them and can uncover two more cards. If they’re different, they stay in play and it’s the next player’s turn. The player with the most pairs of cards at the end is the winner!

name: Brick Breaker: Ball Shooter
description: Welcome to the classic brick breaker game! Shoot and break bricks and become the ball master! Keep up with the bouncing ball and deflect it with your paddle in this classic breakout game! Join the brick world and enjoy all the different challenges and puzzles that await you!

name: CosmoPlayerZ
description: Sin descripción

name: Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway - Turbo Edition
description:
Zuko, the fiery prince of the Fire Nation and classic, throwback version of the red donned Raphael join the action as playable racers alongside crew members Firelord Ozai and Shredder, unique Kart Paint Jobs and more!

This Turbo Edition Includes:
- Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway (base game)
- Zuko from Avatar: The Last Airbender as a playable racer
- Eastman and Laird Raphael from Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles as a playable racer
- Firelord Ozai from Avatar: The Last Airbender as crew member
- Shredder from Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles as a crew member
- Slime style Exhaust Kart Part
- Slime style Monster Wheel Kart Part
- Orange and Purple Kid's Choice Awards Paint Jobs

name: Dragon Quest Treasures: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes Dragon Quest Treasures, three monster allies, and some consumable items for your journey:

- Main Game "Dragon Quest Treasures"
- Great Sabrecat (x1)
- Ruby Golem (x1)
- Icy Dragling (x1)
- Bestest Buddy Bullet (x25)
- Omniheal Bomb (x25)

name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: This edition includes the 385 tracks in the Theatrhythm Final Bar Line core game and adds 27 “special music tracks” plus the 30 tracks from popular Square Enix games included in Season Pass 1 for a stunning 442 tracks to enjoy.

name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - Premium Digital Deluxe Edition
description: This edition includes the 385 tracks in the Theatrhythm Final Bar Line core game and adds 27 “special music tracks,” plus the 90 tracks from popular Square Enix games included in Season Passes 1, 2 and 3 for the ultimate Square Enix music experience. There is an astounding total of 502 tracks to enjoy!

name: Super Ghouls 'n Ghosts
description:
The Game Boy Advance version of Super Ghouls 'n Ghosts includes an "Arrange" Mode not present in the original.
The Arrange Mode lacks a second run, so the Goddess' Bracelet can be obtained anytime when Arthur is equipped with the Golden Armor. Both modes contain a new Save feature, letting the player resume at the last checkpoint with whichever armor and weapon they had equipped.
Arrange Mode also features new routes and new bosses

name: Kalyskah: Jungle Trouble!
description: In this short story, the vampire Kalyskah and her friend Merishya, a succubus, explore a jungle searching for a portal that could take the demoness back home. Things were going well until funny things started to happen.

name: Weaponeer
description: Control your character with two buttons and fight your way through 90+ levels of retro platforming that introduce new and original content.

name: Raining Blood: Hellfire
description: Annihilate countless hordes of enemies while unraveling the mysteries of the demonic invasion in this CoD Zombies-inspired bullet Hell. Kill, upgrade, explore, die, repeat.

name: Undertale Tag
description: A solo co-op experience. Control two humans with one SOUL in a new UNDERGROUND with four official endings (with differing variations).

name: Halt
description: HALT is a story-driven run-&-gun platformer that combines classic RPG-style gameplay with intense arcade action-platforming.

name: SingStar: Miliki
description: SingStar: Miliki is a karaoke game which exclusively features songs by the Spanish clown and musician Miliki. There are no changes to the gameplay formula: player(s) sing into a microphone and the game gives points based on the performance. The only basis of assessment is if the correct note is hit with the correct timing; the sung words or octave does not play into the result.

name: Safe Opening Simulator
description: Simulator where players identify safes through their manufacturer, model, class, and lock. Once identified, players are tasked with opening the safe via different methods.

name: Songs for a Hero 2: March of Malachi
description: Songs for a Hero 2: March of Malachi is an upcoming sequel to the 2D musical platform game, with a brand new story about a world that lives in the shadow of the memory of a once prosperous king, that has been mysteriously dethroned by a ruthless tyrant who rules through fear and brute force. But when the world needs saving most, legends from the past bring forth a new Hero. Experience a new chapter of this saga with a brand-new hero and his many allies, each one of them with their own singing voice. Unravel the mysteries behind the new Hero, help him develop his skills, fight iconic bosses and face Malachi's terrifying army!

name: Train Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: Timebot
description: Timebot is a time traveling puzzle game. Jump back in time and use past versions of yourself to help complete each level.

name: Prepare for Adventure
description: One day, the protagonist gets teleported to a new, unknown town. She wants to go on adventures right away, but the guards won't let her, because she's not properly prepared. She shall fix this predicament.

name: Time Donkey
description: Follow the adventures of the Donkey, inadvertently trapped in the same 30 seconds of time, over and over again. What will he do? Can he escape? And why are there tacos everywhere?

name: Basho's Frogger
description: A short game based on one of the most famous haiku by Matsuo Basho.

name: Necro Saga
description: The story of you and the immortals begins in a kingdom about to be destroyed by a necromancer. You can give someone mercy, or you can take someone's precious things away. This is an action RPG where you decide the ending of the story.

name: 11111Game
description: Master addition in different bases. Slide tiles to add them, take advantage of overflow mechanic and game's grid.
1990 is a fun, casual RPG with turn-based combat.

name: 2 Pattern
description: What about taking an atmospheric trip through a sliding puzzle game ?

name: 32 in 1 Game Special
description: A tribute to those less then stellar computer shareware and multicart games of the past, 32 in 1 features many different game genres, some with a odd sense of humor. Games mainly lean on point scores ,speed runs and survival, all to give you the player a sense of pride and accomplishment!

name: 3 Crystals
description: 3 Crystals is a free twin stick shooter. Protect the Crystals!

name: 3D Don't Die Mr Robot
description: Fresh from the Neon Dunjun, Mr. Robot returns in the third dimension!

name: 4D Golf
description: Explore higher dimensions... with golf! With different visualizations, game modes, and a level editor, you'll gain a hands-on understanding of the 4th dimension and beyond.

name: 4th Dawn
description: A game about choice with multiple endings, set in a cyberpunk dystopia constantly running out of time.

name: 4X4
description: Survive in a limited space of 16 spaces divided into 4x4 spaces, avoiding obstacles with different themes on each stage

name: 500 Second Challenge
description: As the ladder gets faster and narrower, can you increase your living space through the upgrade system? Last for 500 seconds, and your gameplay will be different from everyone else's depending on how your skills level up.

name: 8 Ball 2
description: Drive the crowd wild with your skills.

name: Village Defender
description: 【Village Defender】is a simple and easy-to-use city defense survival game that combines elements of war, levels, equipment, cards, etc. In addition to the combat targets on each battlefield, you can also challenge yourself to fight against how many waves.

name: Virago: Trepidation
description: Virago Trepidation is about a girl called Willow who after her stalker is released from prison, begins to manipulate her with threat and causes her to lose sight of what is real and fake

name: Violet's Party Mania
description: Violet is hosting a party and is still missing some items! Help her search through the clutter to save the day!

name: Vestige Memoria
description: Vestige Memoria is an episodic horror game, in which we take paranormal stories, and turn them into horror experiences. In these thrilling horror experiences, take control of the survivors of these memories, living through these experiences as described by the person.

name: Vehicular Rampage
description: Strap in, start your engine, and get ready to start your rampage! Tear through multiple interesting locations that are packed with fun easter eggs, all while tearing through hoards of terrified pedestrians. Revel in a retro visual style and feel while enjoying modern driving physics and controls!

name: Valora Survival
description: About Survival: Year is 2020, i virus transformed almost the entire humanity in Zombies, you escaped on an island to survive alone or with your friends. About Multiplayer FPS Shooter: if you get bored of survival you can play Multiplayer FPS Shooter Mode The Game doesn't have in-app purchases

name: Letterbox by Powgi
description: Letterbox is a game of anagrams and logical reasoning! Take the letters from a nine-letter word and place them into the grid to form six new five-letter words. There’s only one correct answer that spells valid words in all directions!

name: Vagrus: The Riven Realms - Seekers of Knowledge
description: In Vagrus’s second free DLC, delve into the harrowing halls of the Sunken Tower – a place spoken of only in the most knowledgeable of circles as a deathtrap harboring untold horrors and forbidden secrets.

name: V3: Kommando
description: V3/KOMMANDO is a competitive multiplayer military FPS where players can choose their respective country's very own commando unit and play against other players online.

name: UnderDungeon
description: Embody Kimuto on the first day of his new job in this humor-packed dungeon crawler with surprising secrets to discover!

name: Try Again
description: Try Again is a zelda-like parody game and contains boss fights against Satan on Giants steps. It was made by members of the band "LORD$" to accompany their vinyl release. Contains music celebrities like Thundercat, Louis cole, Jacob collier, Anderson .Paak & a lot more.

name: Trophy Knight
description: Battle hordes of enemies and bosses in this level based action platformer. Find new weapons and level up your hero along the way. Explore deep dungeons to retrieve epic treasures for your trophy room!

name: Typo
description: In this VR narrative game, you must fight your way to escape Athena's testing facility. After she enslaved the planet, you now find yourself doomed to repeat the same arbitrary tests, however, you may be able to escape... Do you have what it takes?

name: Two Cars Stunts Edition
description: What do you know about synchronization? Here is an example when not everything depends on you.

name: Ultimate Waifu Battle Online
description: UWBO is a Tower Defense game about some cute waifus that try to prevent the invading monsters from absorbing the energy from the Energy-Crystals. Play it in coop mode with your friends to help each other and of course the cute helpless girls.

name: Umbra
description: Being hopeless is the feeling you will encounter when you see the dreadful horrors that you will have to face in Umbra, an abyss where the worst horrors that a human can imagine reside, do you dare to face them?

name: Uncounted Isles
description: Travel the Islands of the Uncounted Isle Archipelago to fight and loot. Learn new skills and customize your character for the fights ahead. Trade Equipment you found, but don't forget to store some items in your safehouse, you may need them later...

name: Under Contract
description: An erotic high-skill match 3 arcade game with a comedy-driven narrative that’s guaranteed to lighten a load or two. Climb the corporate ladder and take control!

name: To the Top
description: Accompany Maya and her little companion on an adventure where the only thing that matters is reaching the top.

name: Treekeepers
description: Coordinate, fly, and blast your way through an oversized cartoon world in this 1-4 player co-op adventure!

name: Trash Horror Collection 2
description: This collection has 11 short horror games that you can freely choose which one you want to play.

name: Trainz Plus: Industrial Mayhem
description: A fictional route built in the rust belt of the United States. This map has hundreds of baseboards, miles of track, and thousands of assets with many industries that need products delivered and shipped, and passengers needing transport. Challenge yourself with the 7 sessions included in this DLC.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Industrial Mayhem
description: A fictional route built in the rust belt of the United States. This map has hundreds of baseboards, miles of track, and thousands of assets with many industries that need products delivered and shipped, and passengers needing transport. Challenge yourself with the 7 sessions included in this DLC.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Industrial Mayhem
description: A fictional route built in the rust belt of the United States. This map has hundreds of baseboards, miles of track, and thousands of assets with many industries that need products delivered and shipped, and passengers needing transport. Challenge yourself with the 7 sessions included in this DLC.

name: Train Valley 2: Workshop Gems - Ruby
description: Train Valley 2: Ruby includes 50 new levels with a smart combination of different mechanics and train ages. Try to beat all the brain-teasing missions.

name: Train Life: A Railway Simulator - 1920's Orient-Express Train
description: Take the controls of the legendary Orient-Express steam train operated by the Compagnie Internationale des Wagons-Lits and retrace its storied route, only in Train Life!

name: Touch Love
description: Which correct route can touch the hearts of beautiful girls?

name: Touhou Kimono Blast
description: Touhou Kimono Blast is a danmaku strip 'em up shooting game, full of Touhou famous characters. A huge mystery light shooting form the dark forest. Can the girls going to defeat the monsters and solve the mystery?

name: Touhou Library Survivors
description: Thousands of fairies and familiar faces are swarming the Scarlet Devil Mansion Library! Help Patchouli Knowledge survive by attacking back with bullet hell Spell Cards, gathering experience, and upgrading exponentially!

name: Toynip
description: ''Toynip'' is a cooperative tower defense game for 2 players! Two players cooperate to fight off an army of stuffed animals that are invading your castle.

name: The Beastmaster Princess
description: In this fantasy visual novel, Take the role of Kunya and find out what happened to prince Merril with the help of Luna, Takara, Manila and Lyara. You'll face numerous dangers and in doing so, perhaps you will discover love along with the hidden power of Lyara, the beastmaster princess.

name: The Beauty Cult's: Nectarmancer
description: Nectarmancer tells the story of Aisa, the conscripted Nectarmancer for The Throne in this visually stunning action platformer and "gardenvania" by The Beauty Cult.

name: The Blood Amulet
description: A turn based RPG, with randomized loot, tactical game play and loot sorting. Stylized Visual Arts unlike any other game. Epic Boss fights. Home made music/art. Story Mode, text based game. ---Set out to defeat the Goblin Tribes and destroy The Blood Amulet. By any means.

name: The Boundary Condition
description: A 3D/2D/1D puzzle-platformer. Discover how your interactions with the world change when you exist in less than 3 dimensions. Explore computer-hardware-themed environments and experience a personal story about working alone on a complex project.

name: The Chronicles of Overlord
description: The Chronicles of Overlord is the ultimate turn-based strategy experience. In a race of the Undead, the main player fights against the human world to subjugate people and form an army strong enough to defeat the world destroyer Gruymed. Prepare for 40+ missions in compound mode.

name: The Crypt of Treasure
description: The Crypt of Treasure is an endless, procedurally generated dungeon crawler focused on fast-paced and intense combat, loads of content and unique weapons to match your playstyle, replay value, and making difficult judgments about which door to enter is least likely to result in your death...

name: The Darkest Emptiness
description: A short novel dealing with the problems of loss of taste for life, existential emptiness and the crisis of psychological assistance in Russia. Will you be able to get out of the rut of destructive thoughts?

name: The Edge of Allegoria
description: The Edge of Allegoria is a nostalgic adventure for the 90's kids who grew up playing handheld, turn-based RPG's, who aren't exactly kids anymore.

name: The Electric Odyssey
description: We are all familiar with the apocalypse. The end of the world, beginning of a new age. It isn't over for everyone though, some resist. There is a way out, but it won't be easy. Androids were predictable, but it still seemed too sudden. Could someone else be pulling the strings?

name: The Escape
description: Help Johnny Jones Junior in this platformed and puzzle adventure to discover a surprising ending.

name: Swap
description: Swap is a top-down shooter with unique gameplay mechanics, slow-motion and jump & run elements. Select between three energies to damage your enemies, be healed by them or to send them to hell with your RageFire. Use various weapons, abbilities, physics and slow-motion to fight in style.

name: Suspicious Shuffle
description: Mario Party meets Geometry Wars in this minigame adventure for 1-6 players! Combine speed, memory, brains and finesse to help the Dealer restore balance to the Suspicious universe.

name: Swarmcade
description: Survive the relentless swarm in this arcade take on the 'bullet heaven' action roguelite. Slay 1000s of foes, level up, loot chests and make your character more powerful than ever. Unlock perma-upgrades and more heroes, so you can even the odds on future runs.

name: Swarmed: Nuts & Bolts
description: In deep space, your robot transport vehicle crash-landed on a barren asteroid. The robots have escaped and are hungry for both revenge and crunchy humans. You are their only hope. Battle your way through multiple waves of rouge robots to avoid being SWARMED in this retro, heart pounding game.

name: Sweety Kitty
description: It's a relaxing anime puzzle with cute kawaii girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality artwork.

name: Swimming Pool Cleaner
description: Swimming Pool Cleaner is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to become a one-person pool cleaning team. Take on rewarding tasks of cleaning pools and modifying them. Make them come to life and earn money while doing it!

name: System Restore
description: Play as an Elite Agent of SRF the System Restore Force, with the sole purpose of purging the Virus and it's corruption, climb through the different layers of the Source code and uncover it's mysteries, defeat bosses, and find the Master of the infection, allowing you to RESTORE THE SYSTEM!

name: Tabula Sono
description: Tabula Sono is a free-to-play 3D virtual tabletop. Play any grid-based RPGs like DnD, Pathfinder, Lancer, and Monster of the Week with your friends online. Sono is inspired by that in-person tabletop experience — sitting around the table with friends, whiteboard markers, and miniatures.

name: Tale of Two Sardines
description: Guide Miko through her daily life in alternate-universe Japan! Help her do her homework, clean up the dishes, re-arrange time and space, and more! And quickly, because the world may or may not be coming to an end!

name: The Backrooms Multiplayer
description: You and your friends have found a camera with a footage in it. For some reason you can't rewind the video, and as soon as you try winding it forward you all find yourself in the Backrooms. Together figure out whats in the footage and try to ESCAPE AS FAST AS POSSIBLE!

name: The 22nd is Serda. F0a178
description: Age of spiritual inequality concentrated in one yard. Because today the environment around us is diversified with guests and mirror reflections, a walk can be helpful. 9490.

name: Technikiller
description: Technikiller is a sci-fi shooter set inside a mega-factory. Hack in and take control of a hulking mech to blast your way through hordes of killer robots. Fight your way to the core and shut it down.

name: Tech Invaders TD
description: Have you ever wanted to eliminate ALL the stupid hackers on the internet? And then create your own Anti-Hacker company? So buy and play Tech Invaders!

name: Tarzan VR: #3 The Dead of the Night
description: As night draws in, the jungle swamp poses all manner of hidden dangers. Jane is in mortal peril, and only the strange fruit found in the heart of the Valley of Forever can save the life of Tarzan’s true love. Features "The Strong Bow" and its flaming arrows of vengeance.

name: Task Force Admiral: Vol.1 - American Carrier Battles
description: Experience the thrill of leading American aircraft carriers to victory in this innovative full 3D command simulation wargame set in the Pacific in 1942. First-person or God’s eye, you lead your fleet and planes right from the center of the battle.

name: Survive the Troll
description: Survive the Troll is a "Chill" Real Time Strategy game in which you play as a Troll, a charismatic Hero you can upgrade in your base, or as an Elf, a builder which is common food for the Troll. Cooperate or destroy. You choose.

name: Survive the Forest
description: You need to Survive the forest from infected. You need to get resources and survive from infected and you need to build up and you need to find out what happened to you. They are infected with F virus and you need to try to find a vaccine for them if you don't humanity will be lost.

name: Surfwords
description: Surfwords is a fast-paced word building game. Letters drop from the top of the screen in two columns. You have to choose which column to take at each row, in order to build up a series of words. Bet you can't last 30 seconds!

name: Supreme Ruler 2030
description: Supreme Ruler 2030 is an updated and remastered addition to the Supreme Ruler game series, one of the most comprehensive Real Time Geo-Political Strategy Games for PC.

name: Super Sushi Roll
description: Super Sushi Roll is a 2D roll-a-ball platformer. Rotate your chopsticks and roll your sushi to the goal. Master the mechanics, mind the time limit, unlock new sushi rolls, and search for hidden collectibles!

name: Super Nova Party
description: Prove to your friends that you're the true hero of the galaxy in an out-of-this-world party game! Win minigames and reach distant planets to save the most escape pods before Nova implodes.

name: Strikers
description: Strikers is a fast-paced local multiplayer fighting game where if you get hit once you lose. The game focuses on its quick pacing and interactions between different attacks/projectiles. Battle your friends and figure out who is a better fighter!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Food
description: Puzzles of Food!

name: Super Galaxy Ball
description: A 3D Platformer set in space with 40+ levels and a built-in level editor. Race for the fastest times in campaign or custom levels either by yourself or with your friends online.

name: Super Company
description: You will act as an entrepreneur in the 1990s, producing all kinds of goods that citizens need; Providing residential and educational services for citizens; Carry out international trade and upgrade industries. You should choose the right development strategy to grow the company.

name: Super Choppy Orc
description: Help Choppy Orc release his friends from their chest prisons. Strike enemies with your Axe or pin it on a wall to make a bouncy platform for Choppy Orc to jump on. Utilise the different kind of walls, each one alters the way you move through the level. Spring up, dash forward or float away!

name: Super Bloo Kid Adventure
description: Super Bloo Kid Adventure is a classic fast paced 2D retro-style platformer experience with lovely designed pixel-graphics and a full chiptune soundtrack. Master brutal bossfights and discover lots of secrets in the world of Super Bloo Kid Adventure.

name: Stunt Legends
description: Drift, speed and all sorts of stunts await you in this unique and innovative game. The realism of the details will envelop you until you feel the movement of the pistons in your bones. Stunt Legends is an explosion of colors and adrenaline. Speed and fun with no limits.

name: Sue Shi Survival
description: The ghosts of sea creatures you've slaughtered as a sushi chef are out for revenge. Survive the night by exterminating crowds of them for the second time in this survival roguelite!

name: Sumiii
description: Sumiii is a punishing challenge in which everything kills you. Evade to advance.

name: Sorted!
description: Sorting trash has never been so much fun! Be the change you want to see in the world - sort, fight against time, practice your skills and find valuables!

name: Space Adventure: Escape from Siphilus 1b
description: Space Adventure - Escape form Siphilus 1b is a point & click adventure with challenging puzzles, funny dialogues and beautiful graphics. It's a rather quiet, chilled game accompanied by a harmonious electronic sound.

name: Space Shrooms RollPlay
description: Anime style story and dice games with music. single player, PVP, local, LAN and online.

name: Sonder: Lights of Little Tokyo
description: Sonder : Lights of Little Tokyo is a short and casual 2D adventure game with beautiful hand-drawn pixel art. Explore Little Tokyo, meet bizarre characters, complete quirky quests.

name: Sorcerer Standoff
description: Choose from one of four Sorcerers and engage in third-person magical duels as you tame volatile lightning, contort space and time, meld spells with alchemy, or employ a flock of spectral phoenixes across eight unique locations in this local, split-screen fighter.

name: Sokobear: Autumn
description: It's Fall and leaves won't stop falling! Bear's newest job is cleaning the lawns of the neighbourhood. Solve the sokoban style puzzles pushing bundles of leaves away. Clean fields mean a merry forest folk!

name: Sokobear: Spring
description: Spring announces itself with many pumpkins sprouting out of the ground. Bear needs to harvest them. Roll them around with care and whack some nosy moles that are in the middle of the field! Solve the sokoban style puzzles to help Bear collect the pumpkins and have a good time!

name: SokoFrog
description: SokoFrog is a puzzle game about pushing boxes, help your frog friend get to the next level.

name: Solasta: Crown of the Magister - Inner Strength
description: Complete your party with the Inner Strength DLC! Unlock the Warlock, Bard & Monk classes & the Dragonborn ancestry and head back into Solasta for more adventures!

name: Solar Expanse
description: Explore the Solar System. Mine and drop asteroids. Colonize and terraform. Lead the space race and compete with other corporations on your way to profit. Watch the expansion of human race over the centuries. Then go beyond and conquer the galaxy!

name: Sokosignal
description: Sokosignal is a puzzle game in which you send a signal with each move you make.

name: Sex Adventures: BDSM Dungeon
description: An erotic visual novel about a young couple who hires a Dominatrix. Everything takes a turn when she starts explaining the rules.

name: Sex Adventures: GangBang Surprise
description: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a famous young divorcee surprised by one of her ex-boyfriends with an unexpected gang bang.

name: Sex Adventures: Modeling Audition
description: A visual novel about a young woman looking for some extra cash. Everything takes a turn when she applies for a modeling job online.

name: Sex Adventures: The Bar Hookup
description: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of twenty-three years old Luiza hooking up with her very big and very cocky customer in the bathroom of the empty college bar she’s working at.

name: Seven Skies to Paradise
description: Embark on a hopeless journey to reach the mythical 7th sky and find your father in this atmospheric adventure game. As you travel the skies in your small airship you will face the creatures of the abyss, solve the secrets of the portals and survive worlds bizzare beyond human imagination.

name: Shadow Survival
description: Shadow Survival is a single-player / multiplayer cooperative wave based first person shooter with deep class and weapon customization, on procedurally generated landscapes, against armies of procedurally generated demonic forces.

name: Shadow Jump
description: Shadow Jump is a challenging fantasy platformer game focused around difficulty and freedom of movement. There are no set routes or strategies; players will be able to carve their own route to the top. Success will require determination, precision and a lot of patience...

name: Shadow Fight: Arena
description: Experience gripping real-time PvP. Choose three brave heroes from a large set of Shadow Fight characters - and fight your way through the tournaments against real players.

name: Sex Apocalypse 3D
description: In Sex Apocalypse 3D You need to survive in a post-apocalyptic megapolis with lots of zombies in it. After successful battle with zombies you will get amazing arts and videos with hot female protagonist.

name: Silence of the Siren
description: Turn-based sci-fi strategy game that combines exploration and exciting clashes on the battlefield. Take control over several different species, raise powerful armies and destroy your opponents!

name: Siana Tales
description: In this mysterious "Shana continent", there is a tree of life that can transform objects into human-like creatures, called "object spirits". The world is currently under attack by demons from the abyss, and you, as a warrior, are needed to save life. And you will exploring your true identity.

name: Shuffled Words
description: Shuffled Words is a casual word guessing game!

name: Ships Simulator 2024
description: Play as the captain and take the controls of one of the many available ships. Perform various tasks, plan the route yourself and admire the views as you navigate between the largest European ports!

name: Shizuku: Japanese myth
description: "Shizuku : Japanese myth" is a 2D action game set in Japan. The fox girl can transform into various forms, and can take over not only the form of the target but also its abilities. There is no single answer, and the game can be played according to your style of play.

name: Save Santa
description: Save Santa is an action 3D platformer where you need to help Santa collect all the gifts that the evil witch spread all over the world.

name: Sawdust
description: Sand saw and nail your way through this chaotic couch co-op game for one to four players. Gather your finely-grained team of carpenters and carve out your oak-shaped fortune. Make sure you keep up your production line to keep every customer satisfied.

name: Search All: Buds
description: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the buds (flowers) on a large location. The buds (flowers) will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Keys
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the keys in a large location. The keys will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Mice
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the mice in a large location. The mice will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Sea Scenes
description: Sea Scenes is a boat and ship driving game. There are no gameplay objectives or missions, just WASD-based boat driving in 3 different levels and 7 different ships.

name: Seasick
description: Assume the role of marine life in this casual turn-based strategy game and overcome the ultimate danger, pollution and climate change. Will you evolve and adapt to the new harsh conditions or will your ecosystem wither and become extinct?

name: Sentient Noir
description: A dark, dystopian alien City. Four factions want the incredible powers of a Detective Hunter for their own ends. With these powers, you're able destroy the sentimant populous. You are feared but by maybe that can change as you discover the secrets of the sentient city.

name: Seven Days
description: Seven Days is a single-player first-person exploration game. Play as a camper who has come to Camp Summershade for a peaceful retreat. But things take a turn when you start finding strange things around you at Summershade.

name: Scripted Land
description: Code your territory's AI to make it prosper! Manage production and processing, strengthen your adventurers and let them explore! Can you prevent enemy invasion and win the war? This is a hex-based 2D game where you register Lua scripts as your lords and manage your territory.

name: Scribblequest
description: This is not just a game with music in it, it’s like *LITERALLY* a musical... But also a game... You’ll see.

name: Scrap Games
description: Build and program your own fighting robot out of scraps. Win prizes and find more scrap materials to build improvements and new weapons. Teach your robot new moves and strategies. Win fights and challenges and become the ultimate hero of the Scrap Games!

name: SCP: Facility Manager
description: Build and manage an SCP Foundation site!

name: Scientifically Accurate Dinosaur Mating Simulator 2022: American Revolution 1775 - 1786
description: Fake history. Real dinosaurs. Race across the birth of America, fight in historically inaccurate battles, and win the war for all humankind.

name: Nukepath
description: Nukepath is a post-apocaliptic action roguelike, where a survivor must get out of town before a nuclear bomb explodes everything.

name: Out of the Cube
description: Think Out of The Cube to help Pinkube rescue Biskute in this grand dispute. Shoot 3 cubes to Teleport, Carry or Push and Pull. To pass the levels you'd to be no fool: collecting coins and getting it right to go all the way through.

name: One Last Try
description: Build. Fight. Survive. Play with friends or by yourself in this platform co-op game for up to 4 players. Use a Minigun, a Flamethrower, or a Jetpack. Upgrade weapons. Place your defenses. Survive longer than you did last time.

name: Morbid
description: Morbid is an atmospheric psychological horror game; experienced as Senior Detective J. Taylor, unfold haunting and morbid events that will question your sanity.

name: Motherless: Season 2 - Chapter 12
description: The story picks up right after the plane takes off to Italy, where a tired Sunny heads to the bedroom... just to be surprised by an unexpected guest!

name: Motherless: Season 2 - Chapter 13
description: Sunny is getting ready to fly back to the U.S. when Florencia shows up wanting to go with him, leaving him no choice.

name: Motherless: Season 2 - Chapter 14
description: After getting into an interesting situation with Anastasiya, Sunny will have to find a way to bring her back to her senses.

name: Motherless: Season 2 - Chapter 15
description: Sunny's life couldn't be going better, but there's trouble on the horizon...

name: Motel Life Simulator
description: This is your chance to be the owner of Motel. Build, Renovate and expand your Motel empire. Clean the rooms and look after the needs of your guests like Food, Entertainment and Comfort. Create a ultimate Road side stop for everything a traveler needs.

name: The First Mountain
description: A Simple 2D Platform Game.

name: Light Kin
description: Don't let the calming fire fool you in this chaotic Bullet Hell style game. Rise to the challenge as you reach new heights while collecting embers of your own kin. Release them all in a satisfying display of fireworks and rack up your score! Can you rise up and burn your mark on the leaderboard?

name: Mezzanine
description: A psychotronic office adventure set in the heart of Multimedia Gulch on the eve of the year 2000.

name: My Bloody Weekend
description: "My Bloody Weekend" is a survival horror in Quick Time Events, set in a mansion where a killer with a cleaver tries to kill a girl ... can you survive? Real actors, real terror!

name: Living With Dragons
description: Travel with your dragon companion to locate and hatch the 6 Elemental Dragons. Farm crops and raise livestock to feed your creature companions as well as crafting items to make your journey easier. Tame new creature companions and use their abilities to improve your farming and crafting.

name: To Eternity
description: Play as a hero who wants to seek eternity, face unknown monsters, do tense and exciting slashing, gain the ability to purchase attributes of gold, and defeat the final Boss, forward to eternity in your mind!

name: The Game Store
description: You get to pick out a game from the Game Store in town but do not choose a certain game.

name: Salt Game
description: Salt Game is a course game, platforms with obstacles and traps. It seems simple to take the steps, but beware appearances are deceptive. This simplistic game is designed to instill rage in the hearts of players, some things that may look like a bug are not bugs but are there to increase stress. The goal of the game is simple, the player must reach the end of the Salt Game course by passing the various obstacles and traps which at first glance seem simple but in the end not so much. Good luck players!

name: Protect My Cheese
description: A stunning and chaotic tower defense strategy game where we play as cats to defeat the cheese-hungry rats. Survive against waves of enemies and guard the cheese.

name: Spy Swatter 2
description: Spy Swatter 2 - Bad Dudes have stolen Top Secret Files and scattered them all over the World ! Travel to Cool Locations and Get The Bad Dudes, Get the Files and Save us ALL !

name: Rubber Brawl
description: Roll into a crazy 32-player Brawler Royale of pumped-up tires to be the last one standing. Overcome the laws of physics, perform aerial tricks and knock down tires to survive against the other players! Be a Rubber Brawl legend!

name: Ragdoll Slayer
description: Welcome back to the Medieval Era! Here only the strongest survive.

name: Napped
description: Napped is a pixel first person horror game where you take the roll of a reporter on his way to the biggest story in his life.

name: Spinout Drifter
description: Narrative: Drift through the city, dodging cars and other things alike! Drifting: Control your car in various ways to maneuver through traffic! Customize your car: Choose from a variety of car body's, colors, and tires!

name: Dark Moon Motel
description: Dark Moon Motel is a horror comedy game set in a run-down motel in the middle of nowhere, where the guest are a little bit monstrous. Gather clues, solve puzzles, avoid monsters, take out the trash, and try not to die while doing it.

name: Just Shoot: Slimes
description: Just Shoot: Slimes is a roguelike first-person shooter game where you shoot and explode slimes.

name: Evil Nightmares
description: The Bell is ringing and there is no escape. The world is quickly shrouded in darkness and horrifying creatures lurk for Marv. He must face his fears and find a way out of this nightmare or he will be trapped in hellfire forever.

name: Tireless Pig
description: A simple and fun game about a pig. The adventure of a pig for every member of the family. Funny game for leisure. Help the pig to go through all the obstacles.

name: Running into the Cyberpunk
description: A wanted criminal trying to outrun the robots. Robots that are trying to put a stop to her escape. How long could you last in this cyberpunk universe? Run into the cyberpunk to find out!

name: My House is Haunted
description: A Multiplayer Strategy Horror game which you can play as a Ghost or Exorcists. Play as a ghost and you can use abilities such as Clone, Possess, Summon clone, fly around, Move through walls, Locate players, etc. Play as Exorcists and protect the family who commission you.

name: The War Enders: First Strike
description: The War Enders: First Strike is a bullet hell shooting game. While having 3D graphics, the game keeps a classic taste of this hardcore genre. Select and customize your fighter with interest. Dodge the bullet and strike back the unknown with the determination to save the Earth!

name: Ayyylando
description: Ayyylando is a chill strategy game where you build happy little cities in the sky. Explore a variety of colorful islands, care for your buildings' happiness, evolve your buildings to help you grow, and when solid ground is no longer cool enough for you - expand onto the cliff sides.

name: Albert's Journey
description: Albert’s Journey is a 2d platformer adventure game with a pixel art look.

name: Ryewood Town
description: Ryewood Town is a relaxing, RPG-Style farming adventure. Grow your land, tame wild animals, fight monsters, craft new items, and personalize your home!

name: Godland: The Fire Quest 2
description: This visual novel puts you in the place of Ruban Gusandar fighting for the freedom of his people, lead your people against an overpowering empire and select the best possible choices...

name: KFZ
description: KFZ is a Zombie wave based shooter featuring 9 levels and plenty of Gore

name: Latin America Empire 2027
description: Lead your Latin empire in an empire building turn based strategy war game. Are you ready to lead, Supreme Commander?

name: Huge Jaws
description: Huge Jaws - a game about a shark in the indie simulator genre, made in cute 3D graphics with nice music.

name: Predictors
description: When the wizards get bored, they begin to arrange battle royales between the brave heroes and the hordes of evil spirits. Choose a hero, manage his plans and predict the moves of opponents. Play against artificial intelligence, as well as with your friends - in cooperative and PvP modes.

name: Muse & Barbarian
description: This is a combination of third-person and first-person shooter game. As a warrior, you should break through seven stages to rescue Valkyries from demonic control.

name: Melting Point
description: Melting Point is an action puzzle game for all ages. How to Play: Run your Fire Sprite through the many puzzle levels and clear out as much Ice as you can, while keeping an eye on your health, for each Ice Block will cost you one unit of health, while Blue Ice will cost you two.

name: The Trench
description: The Trench is a short horror experience in which you will command the Pandora submarine, exploring the depths of a trench that has been uncovered after an earthquake in the Pacific Ocean, your mission will be to retrieve all the data from a previous accident involving another submarine "The Neptune"

name: Witch Amelia
description: "Witch Amelia" is about Rody who dreaming of becoming a hero and his childhood friend Amelia went on an adventure together. Both believe that their relationship and this feeling of happiness will last forever.

name: Look Find Find
description: "Look Find Find" is a cartoon style casual game. Players need to find the corresponding props in the scene according to the prompts.

name: Cyber Slayer
description: Battle your way through waves of robots as you attempt to survive in an unforgiving, grungy arena. Bathe in glory as you put on a good show for the audience, and be rewarded with upgrades. Try to last as long as you can to put your name down in history!

name: Dangerous Fists
description: This is dangerous fists, the real experience of fighting in VR, the video game when you can fight to the end, there is no rules, no limited time to beat your opponent, fight to win!.

name: Pixel Boy: The Legend of Tain
description: Play as Tain, as he embarks on a quest, to rescue his dear friend who has been kidnapped by an evil wizard.

name: Fish the Detective!
description: -A cartoonish capturing of noir fiction. -Cute n' funny dialogue. -About a half-hour of gameplay.

name: Math Adventures
description: Math Adventures Innovative game showing that Math is not difficult or boring! Not at all! Game develops mathematic skills and abilities of player. Consists of series of tasks for children and teens. Each task includes four levels of difficulty.

name: Andromeda Survivors
description: Defeat thousands of enemies that are invading Andromeda! Andromeda Survivors is a casual game with rogue-lite elements where you collect skills and upgrades for your ship to create amazing builds!

name: Singularity Runner
description: How good a runner are you? Compete against other players in the ranking of the best runners.

name: Zad Maldan My Bloody Sacrifice
description: First person hack-n-slash shooter horror game. Blood and gore with partial nudity.

name: Africa Empire 2027
description: Lead your African empire in an empire building turn based strategy war game. Are you ready to lead, Supreme Commander?

name: Spooky Halloween in the Voxel World
description: Welcome to the Voxel World! Halloween is about to begin and you are excited for your adventure! But remember, in this period, Voxel World is a dangerous place... Hunting season has begun! Don't forget your sword and always follow grandma's advice. The monsters won't go away alone...

name: World Zero
description: World Zero is a simple easy to pick up turn based rpg with not too many gimmicks. Traverse the world and meet a diverse cast of characters who some may even join your party. Different party members can change up on the dialogue.

name: N-Gon
description: An acid trip back to classic vector arcade action games with the unique bullet magnet mechanic. Dodge ruthless attacks, bend your projectile trajectory, destroy waves of enemies with the massive explosion chains. Die a lot! Then try again and get yourself to top of the leaderboards

name: Tomb of the Dead
description: Fight against endless waves of demons inside a flesh creature. Classic horde gameplay.

name: Innocent's Purgatory
description: Innocents Purgatory is a horror themed first person RPG, melee combat the evil spirits of the purgatory, use magic to gain an advantage over your opponents, explore the purgatory to discover its secrets, 20 hours of gameplay, 4 endings.

name: Aevumblade Chronicles
description: The Aevumblade Chronicles is an action role-playing game that embarks a grand journey with Marcus and his friends. Join them as they explore and battle through a series of challenges throughout the world of Eirensia. They are set in a mission to restore and save the world from its demise.

name: Square Rounds
description: Square Round's is a Shooter Survival Round based game. Can you survive all 350 rounds? If you can, you shall be compared to a Legend. Game difficulty increases. Saves your High score and High Round to try to beat your own records. There is a Armor and Health system.

name: Retro Gadgets
description: Retro Gadgets is a gadget creation station where you invent, build, solder, code and customise your own electrifying gadgets then share them with the world.

name: Layer Hunt
description: Layer Hunt is a survival sandbox and dungeon game where the goal is to survive and hunt down all the bosses. To reach your goal you will have to mine, craft, build, farm, fight and explore for new abilities and resources.

name: Slave of Lust
description: Slave Of Lust is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story tells the story of two university students who came to help a teacher. But they are locked in the same room. At this point, instincts kick in and the students get closer...

name: Huntscape
description: Huntscape is a multiplayer (4vs4) PvP survival game where 4 players play as Hunters and 4 play as Prey. Hunters must hunt down Prey, while they try to sneak around, survive and escape

name: AntiShatter
description: Pilot your own Spaceship in this Sci-fi Space Shooter game! Shoot Asteroids to collect Antimatter, Metals, and Pickups! Use the Metals and Antimatter you collect to upgrade your Spaceship! Level up to unlock stronger Metal tiers to collect, craft or buy Parts from the Store! Survive endless Space!

name: Pretty Girls Tile Match
description: A matchpalz game is now available in the "Pretty Girls" series, where you match 3 mahjong tiles with the same design and erase them! Clear the stage, get costumes for 6 Pretty Girls, and aim for completion!

name: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!! Remastered
description: You're a skydiving, video-streaming guerilla artist in the floating city of Boston High. Your job is to leap from buildings, cause mischief, and not get caught by the police.

name: Absolute Matter
description: Absolute Matter is a tactical extraction shooter all about player interaction. In this high stakes PvX game both the players and the environment dynamically create quests.

name: Absorb
description: Absorb is a reverse horror game in which you navigate through a series of sci-fi environments devouring all the astronauts, soldiers, and cyberpunk heroes you come across.

name: Acretia: Guardians of Lian
description: Two worlds merged. A feud that lasted for hundreds of years. The flame of destruction slowly pulsates in the gap. Join your legion on a great journey to cut the chains of hatred and save the world from the primordial darkness.

name: Actala: The Hero's Shadow
description: The fairy tale is over. The Hero won. But the story is just beginning. Explore the web of intrigue in this emotional, suspenseful visual novel, depicted with hundreds of unique, animated illustrations. Who is the hero, and who is the villain? Who lives, and who dies? Your choices will decide.

name: Adanath
description: Adanath is a 2.5D side scrolling single player, action and exploration oriented, story based adventure game with a fluid & innovative PvE combat system.

name: Adventure of Elysia
description: Experience a new adventure on the mysterious island of Elysia! Follow the hints, explore the world, solve dungeons and unravel the mystery of the island. Will you be able to uncover the truth?

name: Aerial Platforms
description: Aerial Platforms is a first person platformer game. Run your way through levels, before the timer hits 0:00, jumping on different platforms while ("the floor is lava")

name: Aero GPX
description: Aero GPX is an anti-gravity racer focused on high velocity, flight, machine-to-machine combat, and responsive controls that are easy to pick up but difficult to master. Fight for the best position possible with high speeds, risky maneuvers, and visceral attacks!

name: Aery: Calm Mind 3
description: Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: Aery: Heaven & Hell
description: Discover the passions and fears of the human race as a flying god-like creature.

name: A Friend Called Loneliness
description: A Friend Called Loneliness is a third-person exploration game based on the song from The Beatles, Eleanor Rigby. Uncover the truth of our main character Norra, as she will leave you clues through her poems that she has written.

name: Amok Runner
description: One day, a noble woman turns our protagonist's (the doctor) life upside down by visiting his clinic, in a town where the amok madness is rampant. The doctor leaves all his personal effects and career aside and begins to follow this woman's footsteps while fighting against the deadly amok syndrome.

name: Ankh Tower: Protect the Fortress with Dark Magic
description: Ankh Tower is a dark-fantasy rogue-like strategy. In the depths of darkness, the Ankh remains the only bastion of life. Build your tower wisely using the offensive, defensive and magical capabilities of its floors. Develop your arsenal of spells to defeat evil forces. Protect the Ankh and survive.

name: Annihilation
description: Annihilation is Character Based 60 Players Battle Royale and 5v5 online shooter game.You have to focus on surviving and understand your operator's skills to be the Last Man Standing.

name: Anxiety.exe
description: Relaxing, cute and informative game about anxiety disorders and mental health in general.

name: Ascend: Reborn
description: Ascend Reborn is an old-school, 3rd person action RPG. Wage war as a brutal Caos warrior on your journey to Ascension. The reign of the Titans has come to an end. The New Gods have risen to claim ultimate power and need a champion. Will you rise to the challenge?

name: Astraea
description: Astraea is a 2D Shoot 'em up game. You will fight through enemies of increasing strength and frequency. As you defeat enemies you gain access to upgrades to make your ship stronger. Attempt to max out your ship and try to beat others high scores.

name: Astral Tournament: A prequel of the Astral Masters
description: This DLC contains a special collection build of Astral Tournament game dedicated to it's 20th anniversary (first published on SEP-23-2002). This is the first game of the Astral games series and the direct ancestor of Spectromancer game.

name: My Girlfriend Loves My Blood
description: When a beautiful new girl transfers to your school, it falls to you to give her a tour. Things seem to be going well… until you cut your hand. Now you're being chased by powerful vampires from the Underworld who want your special blood, and your only respite is a group of vampire sisters who swear to use your powers for good!

name: Auto Immune
description: A virus is attacking your cells, and its up to you to defend them! Buy and combine cells to assemble your immune response. Discover powerful synergies to overcome a constantly evolving enemy in this physics-based auto battler. Outlast your opponents or work together to achieve immunity.

name: Awakening of Legend
description: Awakening of Legend is a free, retro-inspired, rogue-like adventure with randomized loot, transferable perks and combat inspired by the Active Time Battle (ATB) system from old school JRPGs.

name: Azarine Heart
description: What will you sacrifice; for the safety of your sister?

name: Swords of Legends Online: Collector's Edition
description: Deck out your mystical hero all in gold with the additional costume and opulent weapon skin. Or slip into an all-black ensemble and take to the shadows. You also get some fantastic wings, plus a set for expanding your residence with an enchanting garden.

name: Swords of Legends Online: Deluxe Edition
description: Swords of Legends Online: Deluxe Edition includes exclusive extras! Deck out your mystical hero all in gold. You’ll radiate grace and command respect in the additional costume and luxurious weapon skin.

name: Elite Dangerous: Commander Premium Edition
description: Take control of your own starship in a cutthroat galaxy. Elite Dangerous is the definitive massively multiplayer space epic. Includes Elite Dangerous: Odyssey, and the Elite Dangerous: Odyssey OST.

name: Beyond the Pines
description: Beyond the Pines is a first-person, story-driven, psychological horror game, inspired by the partnership between Owner and Dog, and the impact when that relationship is threatened, set in a remote cabin, with influences from Welsh folklore and beyond.

name: Bite Me
description: Bite Me is an RPG. It is playable alone or online; it is composed of a Twitch integration. Improve your skills as well as your weapons and enter the legend by fighting, monsters, spectators, broadcasters, or other players!

name: Bonded Forever
description: Bonded Forever is a co-op game that combines horror and puzzle elements. In this game, you and your friend try to go back to the place where you live in your childhood and solve the mysteries that happened while you were away and try to overcome the problems you will face by working together.

name: BoozeBall
description: Booze ball is a casual sports game. Test your aim and reactions against an increasingly difficult computer player to see how many levels you can beat!

name: Bowling

name: Bottle
description: Bottle is a 2D pixel-based platformer, that may or may not have rage-like elements (depends on how good you get at it).

name: Boxes: Lost Fragments
description: As a legendary thief, your next assignment lures you into a grand and lavish mansion. There you find a series of puzzle boxes, designed for an unknown purpose. What should have been a quick in-and-out, gradually turns into your own harrowing struggle for freedom and answers.

name: B-Side
description: Flip the world to survive & piece together what remains in this narratively driven 2-D puzzle game about friendship, identity, and growth.

name: Cat Herder

Both states continue to increase their armaments, which periodically leads to military conflicts. You can experience one of these conflicts in the game "Tiny Blues Vs Mini Reds. The blue dictator has invited you as commander-in-chief to ensure that he wins the war and puts an end to this age-old dispute. Place tanks against the red armored vehicles, use radar to drop crates on the field in which you will find money and useful bonuses.
